title: Viral AI videos raise questions about how we view reality
description: For a bit of a laugh, Travis Marshall uses artificial intelligence to create wacky videos about his hometown, but his light-hearted content also raises serious questions about reality in the age of AI.
content:
Do you remember the class clown in school? Maybe you were the jester creating havoc to entertain, distract and amuse.

title: "Love His Vision On AI": OpenAI's Sam Altman After Meeting PM Modi
description: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman lauded Prime Minister Narendra Modi's vision on Artificial Intelligence, while noting the excitement regarding the technology in India.
content:
New Delhi:
OpenAI CEO Sam Altman lauded Prime Minister Narendra Modi's vision on Artificial Intelligence, while noting the excitement regarding the technology in India.

title: Altman Commends India's Development of Smaller, Narrower AI Models
description: Altman has praised India's development of smaller, narrower AI models, describing them as amazing. His comments highlight India's strategic focus on specialized AI solutions rather than larger, generalized models, providing industry validation for the country's unique approach to artificial intelligence innovation.
content: OpenAI's Altman has publicly praised India's artificial intelligence development efforts, specifically highlighting the country's work on smaller and narrower AI models. His comments reflect recognition of India's strategic approach to AI innovation,... [2259 chars]

title: OpenAI flagged Canada suspect eight months before mass shooting
description: The artificial intelligence company said that the suspected killer — Jesse Van Rootselaar — had an account that was detected about eight months ago by systems that scan for misuse, including the possible furthering of violent activities.
content:
OpenAI flagged and banned the suspect in one of Canada’s worst-ever mass shootings for violating ChatGPT’s usage policy June last year, without referring her to police.

description: Why AI-powered intimacy may make human relationships feel harder

title: Artificial Intelligence as Financial Infrastructure: How AI Is Reshaping Modern Trading Systems
